Description: Egypt [?], small group of adult males [Beja?] standing in front of shelters covered made of poles, mats. Males wearing gowns, one wearing turban. Young child sitting on wooden platform [bed?] at front. Medium: Gelatin silver print.
Producer name: Photographed by: John Frederick Clifford Hunt
Curator's comments: Geography: Bishareem not identified in sources - possibly district named above. Ethnic group suggested by T Cotterill, 15/01/1997. Circumstances: [HUN-] PIC DOC 66.
